name: tibilius-blog
description: Just my personal blog where I write about tech-related stuff.
author: TimFB <timf.brueggemann1999@gmx.de>

scripts.postinstall: VUEPRESS_PATH_CSS="./src/.vuepress/public/assets/fontawesome/css" && [ -d "$VUEPRESS_PATH_CSS" ] && rm -r $VUEPRESS_PATH_CSS || true && mkdir -p $VUEPRESS_PATH_CSS && cp ./node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css $VUEPRESS_PATH_CSS/ && VUEPRESS_PATH_FONTS="./src/.vuepress/public/assets/fontawesome/webfonts" && [ -d "$VUEPRESS_PATH_FONTS" ] && rm -r $VUEPRESS_PATH_FONTS || true && mkdir -p $VUEPRESS_PATH_FONTS && cp ./node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/* $VUEPRESS_PATH_FONTS/
